text: Yeshiva Atlanta (YA) was the first Jewish secondary school in Metro Atlanta, Georgia. It was established on August 28, 1970, and it ran until July 1, 2014, when it was merged with Greenfield Hebrew Academy primary school to form the Atlanta Jewish Academy, a comprehensive Pre-K through 12th Grade School. The final campus was in Doraville.Home. Yeshiva Atlanta. Retrieved on January 7, 2019. "3130 Raymond Drive, Atlanta GA 30340""Official Zoning Map." City of Doraville. Adopted September 6, 2016. title: Yeshiva Atlanta
